widget.header: Justia Lawyer Directory Now Displays Video Chat & Office Availability

description: We are excited to announce that the Justia Lawyer Directory now displays video chat availability and more detailed office information on lawyer profiles. To help individuals easily find lawyers who offer video chat, they may now use the "Offers Video Chat" filter on their searches. Also, for each office listed on your profile, you may update the hours of availability, opening & closing times per day, whether you offer 24-hour support, and any special notices you would like to include, such as that you are conducting consultations by video chat due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
Be found when consumers use the video chat search filter, and make it easy for them to contact you by listing your office hours!
